fields.description: The location of the object within the BOM entry's list of custom fields
The name of the updated custom field
A more detailed description of the updated custom field
The datatype of the updated custom field.
Whether the updated custom field is active or not. Inactive custom fields are not displayed in the UI
The data stored in the custom field for this specific BOM entry. Will be null if there is no data stored
Whether the updated custom field is required and not recommended
Whether the required setting is recommended and not required
Meta data associated with the representation, as described in <<metadata,Meta Data>>
Meta data associated with the representation, as described in <<metadata,Meta Data>>
The number of custom fields updated
